{{info needed section|Pick Block functionality}}
{{HistoryTable
|{{HistoryLine|java}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.0.0|dev=Beta 1.9 Prerelease 3|Brewing stands have an extra item form corresponding to their block ID, which can be obtained via inventory editors with numeric item ID 117. It is not intended to be obtained in conventional gameplay.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.3.1|dev=12w16a|Brewing stand items can now be obtained in singleplayer worlds via the {{cmd|give}} command using the respective numeric ID.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.7.2|dev=13w37a|The direct item form of brewing stands has been removed from the game. It can no longer exist as an item in any way, only as a placed block.}}
|{{HistoryLine|pocket alpha}}
|{{HistoryLine||v0.12.1|dev=build 1|Brewing stands exist as an item.
|The brewing stand block item drops from brewing stands that are mined with a pickaxe.}}
|{{HistoryLine|||dev=build 12|Brewing stands no longer drop the brewing stand item when mined with a regular pickaxe. The item still drops when a brewing stand is mined with a [[Silk Touch]]-enchanted pickaxe.}}
|{{HistoryLine||v0.13.0|dev=build 1|Brewing stands no longer drop the brewing stand block item when mined with any tool.}}
|{{HistoryLine|legacy console edition}}
|{{HistoryLine||xbox=TU7|Brewing stands have been added to the game.}}
}}
